description: Creates a usage plan with the throttle and quota limits, as well as the associated API stages, specified in the payload.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the usage plan.

parameters.name: apiStages
parameters.description: The associated API stages of the usage plan. (dict) --- API stage name of the associated API stage in a usage plan. apiId (string) --- API Id of the associated API stage in a usage plan. stage (string) --- API stage name of the associated API stage in a usage plan. throttle (dict) --- Map containing method level throttling information for API stage in a usage plan. (string) --- (dict) --- The API request rate limits. burstLimit (integer) --- The API target request burst rate limit. This allows more requests through for a period of time than the target rate limit. rateLimit (float) --- The API target request rate limit.

nested_params.name: apiId
nested_params.description: API Id of the associated API stage in a usage plan.

nested_params.name: stage
nested_params.description: API stage name of the associated API stage in a usage plan.

nested_params.name: throttle
nested_params.description: Map containing method level throttling information for API stage in a usage plan.

nested_params.name: burstLimit
nested_params.description: The API target request burst rate limit. This allows more requests through for a period of time than the target rate limit.

nested_params.name: rateLimit
nested_params.description: The API target request rate limit.

parameters.name: throttle
parameters.description: The throttling limits of the usage plan. burstLimit (integer) --- The API target request burst rate limit. This allows more requests through for a period of time than the target rate limit. rateLimit (float) --- The API target request rate limit.

nested_params.name: burstLimit
nested_params.description: The API target request burst rate limit. This allows more requests through for a period of time than the target rate limit.

nested_params.name: rateLimit
nested_params.description: The API target request rate limit.

parameters.name: quota
parameters.description: The quota of the usage plan. limit (integer) --- The target maximum number of requests that can be made in a given time period. offset (integer) --- The number of requests subtracted from the given limit in the initial time period. period (string) --- The time period in which the limit applies. Valid values are 'DAY', 'WEEK' or 'MONTH'.

nested_params.name: limit
nested_params.description: The target maximum number of requests that can be made in a given time period.

nested_params.name: offset
nested_params.description: The number of requests subtracted from the given limit in the initial time period.

nested_params.name: period
nested_params.description: The time period in which the limit applies. Valid values are 'DAY', 'WEEK' or 'MONTH'.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key-value map of strings. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z+-=._:/]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:. The tag value can be up to 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.description: The identifier of a UsagePlan resource.

nested_items.description: The name of a usage plan.

nested_items.name: productCode
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Marketplace product identifier to associate with the usage plan as a SaaS product on the Amazon Web Services Marketplace.
